deepG 0.2.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

calculateStepsPerEpoch()

Calculate the steps per epoch

crispr_full

Example training dataset consiting of a sequence of nucleotides of CRISPR loci Filtered for unambigous characters and contains only characters in the vocabulary A,G,G,T contain all CRISPR loci found in NCBI representative genomes using CRT Can be loaded to workspace via data(crispr_full)

crispr_sample

Example training dataset consiting of a sequence of nucleotides of CRISPR loci Filtered for unambigous characters and contains only characters in the vocabulary A,G,G,T Can be loaded to workspace via data(crispr_sample)

deepG

deepG for GenomeNet

ecoli

E. coli genome for evaluation Can be loaded to workspace via data(ecoli)

ecoliCustomScalar

Custom lambda callback that shows accuacy scores for the E. coli genome in Rensorobard

ecoliEvaluation()

Runs a evaluation on the E. coli genome, returns a list of accuracy value for each letter in the vocabulary

ecoli_small

subset of the E. coli genome for evaluation Can be loaded to workspace via data(ecoli_small)

end_gpu_session()

Ends the GPU session

extractCellFromStates()

Preparing states for tSNE

fastaFileGenerator()

Custom generator for fasta files, will produce chunks in size of batch.size by iterating over the input files.

generateStatesFromFolder()

generate states list for tSNE from a fasta folder it is expected that the length of each fasta file is equal

getStates()

Get cell states of semi-redundant chunks

getStatesFromFasta()

Get cell states from a fasta file

getVocabulary()

Returns the vocabulary from character string

messagef()

Wrapper for message(sprintf)

parenthesis

Training dataset of synthetic parenthesis language Can be loaded to workspace via data(parenthesis)

plotTsne()

generate and plot tSNE

predictNextNucleotide()

Predict next nucleotides in sequence

prediction-class

An S4 class for the prediction

preprocessFasta()

Wrapper of the preprocessSemiRedundant()-function

preprocessSemiRedundant()

Preprocess string to semi-redundant one-hot vector

print(<tf.version>)

Prints TF version

replaceChar()

Replaces specific nucleotides in a sequence

sequenceToArray()

Helper function for fastaFileGenerator

skip_if_no_keras()

Tests if Keras is available for the unit tests

splitSequence()

Helper function for fastaFileGenerator

startGPUSession()

Limit Tensorflow proccess to one or multiple GPUs.

trainNetwork()

Trains a (mostly) Long short-term memory (LSTM) model on genomic data. Designed for developing genome based language models (GenomeNet)

writeDict()

Generates dictionary for LSTMVis

writeHdf5()

generates hdf5 file containing the character id for each time step

  • All functions
